caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities; creating a criminal offense.
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated countries (including China) from purchasing or acquiring real property in Texas. Chinese citizens living in China and Chinese companies headquartered in China or controlled by the Chinese government are banned from buying Texas real estate. Violations result in property divestiture and criminal penalties. US citizens and permanent residents of Chinese descent are exempt.
translation: 该法案禁止来自特定国家（包括中国）的个人和实体购买或获得德克萨斯州的房地产。居住在中国的中国公民以及总部位于中国或受中国政府控制的中国公司将被禁止购买德克萨斯州房地产。违反者将被强制出售财产并面临刑事处罚。具有中国血统的美国公民和永久居民不受影响。
committees:
